branchCategory.name: FC2W
branchCategory.description: <p>Series FC2W is a flow controller for water that is especially suitable to stabilize flow in multiple lines fed by one supply.&nbsp; FC2W offers two flow rates, 0.5 to 4.0 liters per minute.&nbsp; Control is provided by a 1 to 5 VDC signal.&nbsp; A simple 4-wire cable connects a 2 VDC power source, the analog voltage input, and an output signal.&nbsp; The frequency of the voltage pulse output signal scales the flow.&nbsp; A 2 port valve must be included in the flow circuit of complete shutoff is required.</p>

branchItem.name: FC2W*, Flow Control for Water
branchItem.description: <p>Series FC2W is a flow controller for water that is especially suitable to stabilize flow in multiple lines fed by one supply. FC2W offers two flow rates, 0.5 to 4.0 liters per minute.  Control is provided by a 1 to 5 VDC signal. A simple 4-wire cable connects a 2 VDC power source, the analog voltage input, and an output signal. The frequency of the voltage pulse output signal scales the flow. A 2 port valve must be included in the flow circuit if complete shutoff is required.</p>
